currentLevel.title: Basic Balance Sheet
currentLevel.description: Learn to categorize personal finances into assets, liabilities, and equity

scene: You're helping Sarah organize her personal finances. She wants to create a balance sheet to understand her financial position. Help her categorize each item correctly!
prompt: Drag and drop each financial item into the correct category. Remember: Assets = Liabilities + Equity
hints: Assets are things you own that have value (cash, investments, property)
Liabilities are debts or obligations you owe to others (loans, credit cards)
Equity represents your ownership or net worth (savings, investments you own outright)
The balance sheet must balance: Total Assets = Total Liabilities + Total Equity

data.instructions: Drag each item from the left into the appropriate category on the right. Your goal is to create a balanced balance sheet where Assets = Liabilities + Equity.
